Lo probé por estas promociones de fin de semana gratuito, me ha encantado, lo malo es que al principio parece que se avanza un poco lento y hay que tener cierto progreso para empezar a disfrutar el juego.

Лично мне игра очень нравится, не смотря на её дичайший дисбаланс. 
Знаком с ней достаточно давно, и играть умею неплохо, хотя и на 17 ранге (это пока), из зи чего у некоторых игроков складывается мнение что я играю со сторонними софтами.

[h1]Dead by Daylight [/h1]
Jogado exclusivamente um jogador contra quatro, onde um jogador assume o papel do assassino selvagem, e os outros quatro jogadores jogam como sobreviventes, tentando escapar do assassino, reparando cinco geradores e abrindo os portões de saída para evitar ser capturado, enganchados e sacrificados.
Jogar com os amigos torna o jogo muitos mais divertido, deixando você com medo nos momentos certos e com raiva em alguns outros... compre o jogo tendo que mente que se você tiver amigos, só poderá jogar como assassino na personalizada, com um pay to win bem fraco o jogo consegue emparelhar os sobreviventes com o assassino, deixando o jogo muito mais interessante e viciante. Recomendo jogar entre amigos, mas sozinho também é muito bacana!

I love it and hate it.
I wanna die.
I had a sodium overdose after 2 matches.

Dead by Daylight, while not very noob frendly at first, is a fun, multiplayer horror experience. It's best played with a group of freinds (As is most things in life) but playing with said freinds gives you practice for playing with randoms. Playing survivor without knowing how to loop properly, lose the killer, or a variety of different killer time wasting activities can get you hooked and killed fast so you are not much use to your team. You will find yourself hiding more than running, but as soon as you get the hang of a few tricks, survivor goes from boring and frusterating into "I AM A GOD AMONG MEN" as you proceed to loop for gens at a time. Killer on the other hand can also be quite frusterating, it's easy to get a kill here and there but it feels impossible to get 4 kills in a match. If you are someone who thinks killing everyone is the only true "win" do not play killer. However when you find your main and get good, oh boy does in feel good. I am a Nurse main so when I succsesfully chainblink hit a cocky survivor it feels amazing. The biggest issue is the amount of grinding you have to do to get all of your characters up to max level. Unless you are made of money or have alot of free time it will take forever. But the game itself is pretty fun when you do get into it.
Hard game to get in to at the start but if you give it time you will really love it

Ставлю "Не рекомендую" тк почти в 9 катках из 10, всегда вылетает матч, игра попросту не загружается, выскакивает долбаная ошибка 500. Невозможно играть в эту игру, в ТП нету данной проблемы, следовательно неизвестно как ее решить. Переустановка не помогает, кэш тоже. Впн? Как вы думаете, поможет? - Нет. Перепробовал разные способы. Все попытки тщетны. Крч, если тебе неповезло так же как и мне - удаляй нахой
Первые разы страшно, а потом привыкаешь. Игра супер)

Это игра полная параша, в которой если вам овень повезет вам дадут ну чисто с кайфариком убить пару тройку человек. Но во всех остальных случая сраный матчмейкинг будет делать вам хорошо: у вас ранг на убийце 15 и вы только что вообще его купили? Ну поздравляю ебать, вас ждет прекрасная катка против фул тимы, которая обдрачивает это дерьмо в форме игры уже 5к часов, они будут унижать вас, как морально, так и физически, они изнасилуют всю вашу семью, начиная с младшего брата заканчивая мертвой бабушкой, они будут тыкать в вас пальцем показыва "смотрите как лошок хахаха минус реп тунелер". и все это за какие то 500 руб, Игру не советую, матчмейкинг вас убьет, так еще и не вам, а вы хуй пососете.
Merece cada euro gasto. Jogo muito bom

Llevo poco tiempo jugandole pero basta para decir que es un buenísimo juego.
Suspenso, acción, estrategia, risas y demás cosas en conjunto tiene este juego, comprarlo en oferta si tienes la oportunidad y sin ella también, valdrá la pena.
Great game in all but it takes quite a wile to gain other killers overtime but it is a great game.

So glad i played this over halloween weekend while it was free to play.
I then purachsed it straight away while it was on sale for less than £6. 
I've only played for 10 hours so far but things are making more sense to me now and im really starting to enjoy the experience.
the skill checks always make me nervous, more so than the killers!
the bloodweb is a little confusing for a while, but gradually becomes more clear as you adapt.
love the atmosphere of each level, sets a spooky vibe.
overall so far i'd say this is a worthwhile purchase for the expense, or lack of! 
my only real complaint so far that is i think some of the killers are a touch O.T.T in terms of their sheer speed and the lack of ability to escape whatsoever once they are onto you. 
that being said, I am yet to play as a killer...
7/10 from me.

A medida que lo jugas, te da cuenta no solo de lo bueno que esta, si no de lo garcha que es la gente. Los killers viven tuneleando y campeando. Los supervivientes viven escondiendose y no reparan nunca, si quedas con otro y te cuelgan, va a esperar a que mueras para escaparse por la trampilla. Muy buen juego, asquerosa la comunidad.

Fun with Friends, but also very frustrating. Hitboxes are a joke(fr fix them please). You can still get hit AFTER you vault over a window or pallet or if you're like 2 meters in front of the killer. Killer can still hit u right when u stun him with a pallet like how??? The players(both killers and survivors) are some of the most toxic and egoistic people i've ever seen.  Most killers and some perks are very broken imo(too op). Even tho the game has many faults it's still fun to play unless You come across killers who only slug, tunnel, (prox) camp and use no one escapes death(some people would argue that those are just methods to win but they fr ruin the fun for allot of people) or teammates who do nothing( yeah i'm talking to you claudette players who self care and hide in bushes all game long). if u have friends to play with it's fun, but after 2/3 hours i get tired of it and the players and want to cry myself to sleep.

P.S. i hate leatherface and the stupid caveman noises he makes
